title: Placing a telephone order for pizza
context: Call a restaurant and tell them what pizza you want to pick up.

content.bestLine: I'd like to place an order for pickup, please.

neutral.text: I'd like to order a pizza
Can I place an order for pickup?
I'll have a large pepperoni pizza
What's the total for my order?
I'll pick it up in 30 minutes
Do you have any specials today?
I'd like to pay with card

informal.text: Hey, can I get a pizza to go?
I'm gonna grab a pizza, what's good?
Can I get a large with extra cheese?
Can you throw in some garlic knots?
I'll swing by to pick it up
I'll pay when I pick it up

formal.text: I would like to place an order for a pizza to be picked up
Could you please inform me of your current specials?
I will have a large pizza with the following toppings
What is the estimated time of preparation for my order?
I will be paying with credit card upon pickup
Please confirm that my order is accurate

patterns.template: I'd like to order a [size] pizza with [toppings]
patterns.meaning: Ordering a pizza with specific size and toppings

patterns.template: Can I get a [special] and a [drink]?
patterns.meaning: Ordering a special and a drink
